title: Client Crashing Very Often
body: Recently for the past month, my client has been crashing a lot saying "LolClient. exe has stopped working". I've restarted my computer and still doesn't fix it. I've also restarted the client, but sometimes it crashed 4-5 times in a row. So I have to repair the client, but it is only a temporary fix. I have to repair the client atleast 3 times a day to temporarily fix it. Can someone please help me on how to fix my client permanently? Thank you.

replies.body: yes, i get unkown error alot today aftr 1pm est. everything else is fine. Now i have a ban of 2 hrs. ehh     not down with thar clown, junglin axes!

Im having the same problems usually when in champ selects or when i click on something while in a que ( hextech or shop or profile ) and it crashes ive have plenty of time bans and im in one right now this one is only 30min but my worst one was 2 hours
it also caused me to drop lp so i droped from plat 2 to plat 3 and it happened in my plat 2 promos and i got a loss.

Do these crashes happen in a specific area or when you take a specific action? Also do you see any other error messages or indications of what's going on? With this info, I can provide the right steps to take.
